decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Notwithstanding the submitted plans, the front side and rear external elevations of the building hereby approved shall be completed in masonry, rendered and painted white within 3 months of the date of this decision, and retained at all times thereafter.

Condition : 2 - The use hereby permitted for tyre fitting and car repair purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times 8.30-19.00 Monday to Saturday, and 10.00-17.00 on Sundays or public holidays.

Condition : 3 - The rating level of sound emitted from any fixed plant and/or machinery associated with the development shall not exceed background sound levels by more than 5dB(A) between the hours of 0700-2300 (taken as a 15 minute LA90 at the nearest sound sensitive premises) and shall not exceed the background sound level between 2300-0700 (taken as a 15 minute LA90 at the nearest sound sensitive premises). All measurements shall be made in accordance with the methodology of BS4142: 2014 (Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound) and/or its subsequent amendments.
o Where access to the nearest sound sensitive property is not possible, measurements shall be undertaken at an appropriate location and corrected to establish the noise levels at the nearest sound sensitive property.
o Any deviations from the LA90 time interval stipulated above shall be agreed in writing with the local planning authority
Condition : 4 - The carrying out of repairs, maintenance or other works to any vehicle, or the storage of vehicles or of parts, shall not take place outside of the building hereby permitted.
description: Retention of a single storey side and rear extension to the pre-existing workshop
